Table1.Don’t: Leave the house except for essential activities

Table1.Do: Wash hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds
Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue
Table1.Don’t: Go to doctor unless you call first

Table1.Do: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces
Maintain a safe social distance of 6 feet whenever outside of the house
Wear a cloth face covering if you go outside
